title: Godrej 30 L Qube Personal Cooling Solution  (Black, TEC QUBE 30L HS Q103 BLACK)

product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Product Comes With a 1 Years functional Warranty On All Other Parts (Except Bulb, Glass and Add On Plastic Parts) From the Date of Purchase, Against Defective Material and Good Workmanship.
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover/is Not Applicable. In Case of Original Number (Serial no., Sticker) is Removed Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. In case, the Appliance or Any Part is Subjected to Neglect, Abuse or Misuse, Tampering, Alteration or Any other Acts of God, or Damage by Rodents and Insects. The Company is not Responsible for Any Damage Caused to the Appliances and Shall Not Be Liable for Any Consequential Loss or Compensation Nor Refund of Purchase Price or Replacement. Warranty Automatically Expires After the Stipulated Period of Original Purchase Even if the product was Not in Use for any time for Whatsoever Reason

product_description.Sophisticated Solid State Technology: The Godrej 30 L Qube Personal Cooling Solution features a sophisticated solid-state technology that uses a tiny thermoelectric chip, ensuring effective cooling performance with low power usage.
product_description.Easy Maintenance: Built without any movable parts, this cooling solution is hassle-free to clean and maintain.

review: Ample of space for the family in need or for bachelors. It serves it's purpose. It's not a freezer, mind that. It's just a cooler. Nice experience and good delivery service.

its been 12 days since the product arrived..in the manual it says at 32 C temp the temp inside will be 8 degrees
No any working details provided.
Uptill now the performance is good
Its just a cooler not a fridge.
But as it winter right now in mumbai cant say much..will know in summer
for now keeping milk , chocolates and water in it...cooling is slow..but it does cool nicely
milk doesn't get spoiled..
And its environment friendly plus consumes less electricity
I dont know if i can recommend it now....
But all i can say now is it is a good product

Best product with best cost effective brand you will get in this brand which no other can give and consume less electricity.. You will get to store food for two to three people if you have the right vessel
Good for single person. If you are looking for proper fridge add more 2k and get proper fridge as this is just a cooling stuff.

I have been using the qube for over a month. Cooling is good but it takes quite some time to cool. I have also tried to monitor the power consumption with a smart plug and the unit consumes between 14W and 45W for an average consumption of around 0.5KWH per day. So that's around 180 units per year. Even a bigger 200L fridge has lower power consumption. But again the qube is cheap and good for the 3 years with extra warranty and quite suited for my usage so I am content.

Two weeks of Usage.

Very good system. No hassle of compressor or frost. . Just like a cooling box that chills your water and keeps your milk, butter and cheese fresh.. adequate space for one or two people.. very low sound and does not disturb sleep if kept in bedroom. Very Stylish design. Loved it. Real Value for money.

If you want ice, dont buy. This machine was not made for Freezing. Chilling is perfect

Will update after more use.

This is tinny coolest thing ever seen, I been using for 2weeks it’s quite awsome , for bachelor or a married bachelor 🤪, who are try to cook this machine is use full to store little things for longer days ... I love this little lovely cooler no worry about gas flings n maintenance... highly recommend

Product was good but if you r really want more features like freezer you can pay some extra money and get a good product I'm not complying about this product the features options are very minimal so for that you can get other brands with more options......

Small fridge. Does exactly what it says. Small fridges in this size from other companies are only available in upto 3* power rating and in direct cool technology. So you will have to deal with high electricity consumption and frequent defrosting. This solves that problem. Consume only 65W energy and is frost free, as it doesn't cool to that level.

Good for storing water, milk. Very portable and elegant looking. I bought it as I don't need a freezer (wish small fridge were coming with auto defrost but since I don't see any options in the market I went for this without freezer capability) Does it job well and worth the money.
Ample of space for the family in need or for bachelors. It serves it's purpose. It's not a freezer, mind that. It's just a cooler. Nice experience and good delivery service.

Thank you Flipkart for keeping such a good product during offer period

One word for this product. FABULOUS! I've invested my amount for an electronic item, for the first time with Flipkart and trust me, as usual, Flipkart has not disappointed me. Thank you so much Flipkart. It is a lovely product. Perfect cooling, perfect for bachelors.

It is very compact and suitable for Bachelor's or couple. It can give you maximum of 5/8°c of cooling which is sufficient to keep your food fresh and healthy. It's completely noise less which is appreciated. You can keep cool drinks vegetables fruits batter etc. I love it and flipkart for the fast and safe delivery 🚚.
Best purchase of mine. Best cooling solution. So convenient and can be placed anywhere. Chils beverages properly. Ideal for single person
